title: Price Drop: High-End T206 HOF and Rarebacks
author: Rhotchkiss

posts.post_title: Price Drop: High-End T206 HOF and Rarebacks
posts.post_content:
Updated for price drops.  Looking for Offers.  All SGC cards have been submitted for reholder; better scans/pics available on request.  All cards are crease-free and very nice in person

T206 Mathewson Portrait PSA 5.5 -- [STRIKE]$5,500[/STRIKE] $5,400 (last one sold for $6k on 7/20/18 and this is nicer IMO).

T206 Willis Portrait Hindu, SGC 60 -- [STRIKE]$3,000[/STRIKE] $2,800 (last reasonable comp was a PSA 4.5 for $2,700+ in 2012).  This is easily the highest graded on the combined PSA/SGC population report.

T206 M Brown, Chicago Shirt, EPDG PSA 6 -- [STRIKE]$3,000[/STRIKE] $2,800.  None Graded Higher.

T206 McGraw, Glove/Hip, American Beauty 460, SGC 60 -- $960 (last SGC 60 comp was @ $960 and this is nicer IMO).

Prices are negotiable (within reason) and reflect net to me by PayPal FF
Bump for updates, added pics and asking prices
Bump for Price Drop.  Looking for offers
One last bump.  Hoping to do a few deals before the weekend
